item.title: A Cybersecurity Graduate's Quest of Leveling Up
item.description: Introduction Is this thing on? Taps mic Helloooo, fellow cyberhumans! ðŸ‘‹ Your friendly neighborhood cybersecurity newbie here, fresh out of university with a degree in Digital Infrastructure and Cybersecurity. I’m ditching the metal shears for Caido/Burp and ready to dive headfirst into the wild world of ethical hacking. Buckle up, this is my first blog post. Why Cybersecurity? Blame it on the Darknet Diaries. ðŸŽ§ This podcast (which I highly recommend, by the way) opened my eyes to a whole new universe while I was busy hammering metal at my old job in a tinsmithing firm.

item.description: Template post Add content Add a new page to your site. hugo new content content/posts/my-first-post.md Hugo created the file in the content/posts directory.
